metadata.name: Rune Rooms [Release]
metadata.description:
Enter the Rune Room, a cut room type planned for Antibirth, and claim your rewards!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/EzZvNJq.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/9mCoZKo.png[/img] [u][b]Rune Rooms[/b][/u]
A new room type that has a [b]20%[/b] chance to replace vaults. To activate the room's unique floor-wide effect, step on the [b]4 pads[/b] located throughout the room.
[u][b]Table of Effects[/b][/u]
[table] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/BiC5r4s.png[/img][/th] [th][b]Rune Type[/b][/th] [th][b]Positive Effect[/b][/th] [th][b]Negative Effect (Initiated by collecting a rune essence)[/b][/th] [/tr] [/table]
[table] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/nbfbrC1.png[/img][/th] [th]Hagalaz[/th] [th]Destroys all rocks in each room[/th] [th]Chance of replacing regular rocks with their spiked variant[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/aT1tusz.png[/img][/th] [th]Perthro[/th] [th]Items switch between two possibilities[/th] [th]Replaces items with trinkets[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/PMRF3E1.png[/img][/th] [th]Berkano[/th] [th]Killing enemies spawns blue flies and spiders[/th] [th]Killing enemies spawns enemy flies and spiders[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/Uj4nsV4.png[/img][/th] [th]Ehwaz[/th] [th]Spawns a trapdoor to the Great Gideon special crawlspace[/th] [th]Replaces some rocks with trapdoors[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/T0lfKYk.png[/img][/th] [th]Dagaz[/th] [th]Prevents champion enemies from spawning[/th] [th]Increases the amount of champion enemies[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/m6lj9Q3.png[/img][/th] [th]Ansuz[/th] [th]Grants the Mercurius effect[/th] [th]Grants the Amnesia effect[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/iVDdam0.png[/img][/th] [th]Jera[/th] [th]Grants the Contract from Below effect[/th] [th]All pickups have despawn after a certain time[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/LqMy2E3.png[/img][/th] [th]Algiz[/th] [th]Grants a 7 sec shield in each room[/th] [th]Enemies are invincible for 3 seconds in each room[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/ZjabR6a.png[/img][/th] [th]Ingwaz[/th] [th]Regular and red chests get replaced with spiked chests. Locked and bomb chests take 2 keys and bombs to open respectively[/th] [th]Most chests work like eternal chests[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/78XixIy.png[/img][/th] [th]Fehu[/th] [th]Grants midas tears that turn enemies golden[/th] [th]Isaac loses money when taking damage[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/Oc24YC1.png[/img][/th] [th]Gebo[/th] [th]Has a chance of spawning a slot in each room[/th] [th]Destroys all machines without spawning any rewards[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/OWEEagP.png[/img][/th] [th]Kenaz[/th] [th]When entering an uncleared room, poisons all enemies[/th] [th]Enemies spawn poisonous clouds when they die[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/lX1ny4L.png[/img][/th] [th]Othala[/th] [th]Grants a temporary copy of a random item for each room[/th] [th]Rerolls the highest quality item Isaac has into a lower quality one[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/HEzPK7u.png[/img][/th] [th]Sowilo[/th] [th]Spawns a friendly version of the lowest hp enemy when clearing a room[/th] [th]Clearing a room respawns all the enemies[/th] [/tr] [/table]
[u][b]Rune Essences[/b][/u]
[b]Passive items[/b] that appear after bombing the giant crystal present in Rune Rooms. Obtaining them will activate a floor-wide negative effect.
[table] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/KGBbXcM.png[/img][/th] [th]Hagalaz[/th] [th]+3 range. Retracts spikes and spiked rocks. Red and purple fireplaces get replaced by their non-shooting counterparts. Tinted rocks have a higher spawn rate[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/DInwOUd.png[/img][/th] [th]Perthro[/th] [th]+0.5 damage. Rerolling an item guarantees that it'll be the same quality or higher[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/PT7T2Vk.png[/img][/th] [th]Berkano[/th] [th]+0.3 tears. Enemies have a small chance to spawn a temporary familiar when dying. Enemies with less than 10 HP will spawn a bone orbital instead[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/Ni0rlu5.png[/img][/th] [th]Ehwaz[/th] [th]+0.3 shoot speed. Spawns a crawlspace trapdoor in the starting room of all floors. Small chance to open a red door when clearing up a room[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/QP73Si2.png[/img][/th] [th]Dagaz[/th] [th]+1 full heart. +1 soul heart. Prevents curses for the current and next floor. Enemies near Isaac burn. Enemies that die while burning spawn a beam of light[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/0MiGUn1.png[/img][/th] [th]Ansuz[/th] [th]+2 bombs. Reveals the full map on pickup. On further floors, randomly gives The Compass, Treasure Map, or Blue Map effect. Killing an enemy has a small chance of revealing a room in the minimap[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/PEwjIZN.png[/img][/th] [th]Jera[/th] [th]+0.15 speed. All pickups have a chance of respawning somewhere in the room when being collected. Respawned pickups have a chance of becoming a different variant[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/puiGLOQ.png[/img][/th] [th]Algiz[/th] [th]+1 bone heart. Gives a 3-sec shield when entering a room, and reduces the first hit to half a heart. Enemies have a small chance to drop a half-soul heart on death[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/MmoKr9C.png[/img][/th] [th]Ingwaz[/th] [th]+5 keys. Destroying slots, tinted rocks, and opening chests rewards extra keys and pickups. Mimic chests no longer appear, and locked chests are replaced by eternal chests[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/vwSVeKy.png[/img][/th] [th]Fehu[/th] [th]+1 luck. Chance to fire a Midas tear that turns enemies golden. Pennies have a higher chance of getting rerolled into a variant[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/39S4NjH.png[/img][/th] [th]Gebo[/th] [th]+5 coins. +2 bombs. +1 key. The first 5 slots or beggar uses on each floor are free. Slots and beggars will attack enemies in uncleared rooms[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/yf1WZJc.png[/img][/th] [th]Othala[/th] [th]Spawns an item from the Rune Room pool on pickup. Every time Isaac picks up an item, there's a small chance that Isaac receives a duplicate[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/lM2E9BT.png[/img][/th] [th]Sowilo[/th] [th]+1 black heart. The last enemy killed in each room respawns as a permanently charmed version. Whenever a friendly enemy dies, it triggers the Necronomicon effect. Friendly enemies that die, have a small chance to respawn in the next room"[/th] [/tr] [tr] [th][img]https://i.imgur.com/lXmp0MS.png[/img][/th] [th]Kenaz[/th] [th]+1 rotten heart. Nearby enemies get {{Poison}} poisoned. Enemies that die from this poison spawn a poisonous cloud. Standing inside a poison cloud grants Isaac +2 damage and +1 tears[/th] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/56DdjaH.png[/img] [list] [*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/soaring__sky]Soaring_Sky[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198330371330]Thicco Catto[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/fly_6]fly_6[/url] [*][u]𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/goganidze]Goganidze[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url] [*][u]𝐀𝐮𝐝𝐢𝐨[/u] = Ridiculon, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= Gabriel, [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url] [/list]
